trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryServerDownException class exception is thrown when a server is unavailable to respond to a service request.
trans-unit.target: 當伺服器無法回應服務要求時，會擲回 ActiveDirectoryServerDownException 類別例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>類別，使用指定的序列化資訊和資料流內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object for the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> for the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>例外狀況。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>具有指定的錯誤訊息和例外狀況基礎物件類別。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>物件，其中包含基礎例外狀況資訊。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message, a specified error code, and a specified server name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息、 指定的錯誤碼，與指定的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error code that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: 識別錯誤的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that caused the error.
trans-unit.target: 造成錯誤的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, a specified error code, and a specified server name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>類別，其中包含指定的錯誤訊息，基礎的例外狀況物件，指定的錯誤程式碼中，指定的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>物件，其中包含基礎例外狀況資訊。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An error code that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: 識別錯誤的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that caused the error.
trans-unit.target: 造成錯誤的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error code for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得錯誤碼的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>識別錯誤的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>例外狀況的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存之物件的序列化物件資料，關於所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件，其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the message that describes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object error.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述的訊息<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>物件時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述錯誤。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the server that is associated with the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的伺服器名稱<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryServerDownException"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the server that caused this error.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>其中包含導致此錯誤的伺服器名稱。</xref:System.String>
